title: How to Make Very Basic Biscuits

steps.headline: Mix flour, salt, and sugar in a small food processor.
steps.description: Mixing in a mixer may clear any lumps or to be certain you can sieve or shift the ingredients.

steps.headline: Mix in the butter and pulse until the butter in pieces the size of peas.
Carefully add milk and water.
steps.description: Add more flour if mixture becomes too wet.

steps.headline: Add your ingredients and lightly pulse.
Scoop out balls of dough with a 1 inch (2.5 cm) ice-cream scoop on a cookie sheet lined with parchment paper.
Cook in a 350 degree oven for 5-6 minutes or until edges are golden brown.

text: Mix flour, salt, and sugar in a small food processor. Mixing in a mixer may clear any lumps or to be certain you can sieve or shift the ingredients. Mix in the butter and pulse until the butter in pieces the size of peas.  Carefully add milk and water. Add more flour if mixture becomes too wet. Add your ingredients and lightly pulse.  Scoop out balls of dough with a 1 inch (2.5 cm) ice-cream scoop on a cookie sheet lined with parchment paper.  Cook in a 350 degree oven for 5-6 minutes or until edges are golden brown.  Serve warm and enjoy!
